description: Black Cumin “stimulates the body’s energy” and helps recover from fatigue and “disspiritedness”.
Its immune system boosting properties serve as a natural, safe way to  build resistance against illness.Black Cumin seed decreases the activity of the nervous system.
Black Cumin seed extract (500 mg) twice daily over the course of nine weeks in otherwise healthy elderly persons improved memory.
Roasted Black seeds are given internally to stop vomiting.Black Cumin seed is traditionally recommended as an anti-obesity agent.
Black Cumin seed has shown antiviral properties against infectious laryngotracheitis virus.Black Cumin seeds have been traditionally used for the treatment and prevention of kidney stones.

Black Cumin Seed is rich in nutritional values. It is a valuable source of protein, carbohydrates, essential fatty acids, vitamins A, B1, B2, C and niacin as well as minerals such as calcium, potassium, iron, magnesium, selenium and zinc.
